content: link by natasja hornby saddle your dreams before you ride em picture this the windswept landscapes of the island of texel where sheep graze amidst rolling dunes in the netherlands over a million kilograms of wool go to waste each year but with daphne a shepherdess and the support of the knit on texel retreat 2024 we set out to change that through experimentation and collaboration we crafted a unique locally sourced yarn that pays homage to texel s heritage enter the link mitts a tribute to vrolijk garen cheerful yarn and a symbol of sustainable fashion while designed to showcase this special yarn these mitts are versatile enough to embrace any fiber inviting knitters everywhere to join us in a celebration of craftsmanship and community whether it s vrolijk garen or your favorite yarn the link mitts promise warmth style and a connection to a story of resilience and innovation 2 technical information construction gauge these mitts are knit in the round from cuff to
